get.summary: You can call this endpoint to retrieve a controlling person by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the legal entity

post.summary: You can call this endpoint to updates a controlling person's current residential address. The previous address is maintained as address history.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the legal entity

requestBody.description: Information required to update the customer's address

put.summary: You can call this endpoint to adds or update a controlling person's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence, given as an ISO 3166-1 three letter country-code.

requestBody.description: Tax residency details (TIN or reason for no TIN).

delete.summary: You can call this endpoint to removes a controlling person's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence to remove, given as an ISO 3166-1 three letter country-code.

post.summary: You can call this endpoint to create a controlling person to associate with a legal entity.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: Controlling person details and customer ID
